circle_basicText.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_opacity.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_colorMode.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_color.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 1

circle_shadowColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && (circle_colorMode.value == 1 || (circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isChangeBlur.value == false))

circle_shadowBlur.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value != 3

circle_isRandomColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2

circle_firstColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isRandomColor.value == false

circle_secondColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2 && circle_isRandomColor.value == false

circle_isChangeBlur.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 2

circle_hueRange.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 3

circle_saturationRange.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 3

circle_lightnessRange.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 3

circle_gradientOffset.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && (circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true) && circle_colorMode.value == 3

circle_coordinateText.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_offsetX.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_offsetY.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_isClickOffset.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true || circle_isWave.value == true || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true)

circle_ringText.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3 || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true

circle_radius.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true

circle_ringRotation.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_milliSec.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true || circle_isBall.value == true

circle_pointNum.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_innerDistance.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_outerDistance.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_lineCap.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_lineJoin.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

circle_lineWidth.condition: ((global_GlobalSettings.value == true || circle_colorMode.value != 3) && circle_isRing.value == true) || circle_isLineTo.value == true

bars_basicText.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_opacity.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_colorMode.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_color.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value) == true && bars_colorMode.value == 1

bars_shadowColor.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && (bars_colorMode.value == 1 || (bars_colorMode.value == 2 && bars_isChangeBlur.value == false))

bars_shadowBlur.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value != 3

bars_isRandomColor.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2

bars_firstColor.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2 == true && bars_isRandomColor.value == false

bars_secondColor.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2 && bars_isRandomColor.value == false

bars_isChangeBlur.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 2

bars_hueRange.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 3

bars_saturationRange.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 3

bars_lightnessRange.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 3

bars_gradientOffset.condition: (bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true) && bars_colorMode.value == 3

bars_coordinateText.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_offsetX.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_offsetY.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_isClickOffset.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_width.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_height.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_pointNum.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_barsRotation.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_lineCap.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_lineJoin.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

bars_milliSec.condition: bars_isWave.value == true || bars_isBars.value == true || bars_isLineTo.value == true

logo_strokeColor.condition: logo_isLogo.value == true && logo_isCircular.value == true && logo_isStroke.value == true

logo_lineWidth.condition: logo_isLogo.value == true && logo_isCircular.value == true && logo_isStroke.value == true

date_shadowColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && (date_colorMode.value == 1 || (date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isChangeBlur.value == false))

date_firstColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isRandomColor.value == false

date_secondColor.condition: global_GlobalSettings.value == false && date_isDate.value == true && date_colorMode.value == 2 && date_isRandomColor.value == false

particles_color.condition: particles_isParticles.value == true && particles_shapeType.value != 5 && particles_isColorFollow.value == false && particles_colorRandom.value == false

particles_linkColor.condition: particles_isParticles.value == true && particles_linkEnable.value == true && particles_linkColorRandom.value == false

en-us.ui_BG_Text:
Background Settings

Setting background parameters. Currently supports solid color / linear, image, slide and video backgrounds.
en-us.ui_video_Text: Support WebM format video, you can convert other formats to WebM by ffmpeg.
en-us.ui_global_Text:
Global Settings

The audio ring and date display are affected, and their basic parameters and coordinate parameters are set uniformly.
en-us.ui_circle_AudioText:
Audio Settings

Sets the audio parameters of the audio ring and audio bars.
en-us.ui_circle_Text:
Ring Settings

The parameters related to the audio ring are set, and basic parameters, coordinate parameters, ring parameters, line parameters and ball parameters are adjusted.
en-us.ui_bars_Text:
Bars Settings

The parameters related to the audio bars are set, and basic parameters, coordinate parameters, bars parameters and line parameters are adjusted.
en-us.ui_logo_Text:
Logo Settings

The parameters related to the logo are set, and basic parameters, coordinate parameters and logo parameters are adjusted.
en-us.ui_date_Text:
Date Settings

The parameters related to the date are set, and basic parameters, coordinate parameters, date parameters and weather parameters are adjusted. The weather shows only support for China.
en-us.ui_particles_Text:
Particle Settings

The parameters related to the particle are set, and basic parameters, type parameters, line parameters and move parameters are adjusted.
en-us.ui_about_updateText:
Update Description：
Add the LOGO plug-in (bate)
                           -- From Baidu translate.
en-us.ui_about_describeText:
Relevant Instructions：
If you have better text translation, please contact me.

zh-chs.ui_BG_Text:
背景设置

设置背景相关的参数。目前支持纯色/线性、图片、
幻灯片和视频背景。
zh-chs.ui_video_Text: 支持WebM格式视频，你可以通过ffmpeg将其他格式转换成WebM。视频列表和转换具体方法详见创意工坊。
zh-chs.ui_global_Text:
全局设置

影响音频圆环和日期显示，对其基础参数和坐标参
数进行统一设置。
zh-chs.ui_circle_AudioText:
音频设置

设置音频相关的参数，影响音频圆环和音频条形。
zh-chs.ui_circle_Text:
圆环设置

设置音频圆环相关的参数，对其基本参数、坐标参
数、圆环参数、线条参数和小球参数进行调节。
zh-chs.ui_bars_Text:
条形设置

设置音频条形相关的参数，对其基本参数、坐标参
数和线条参数进行调节。
zh-chs.ui_logo_Text:
标志设置

设置标志相关的参数，对其基本参数、坐标参
数和标志参数进行调节。
zh-chs.ui_date_Text:
日期设置

设置日期相关的参数，对其基本参数、坐标参数、
日期参数和天气参数进行调节。天气显示仅支持中
国地区。
zh-chs.ui_particles_Text:
粒子设置

设置粒子特效相关的参数，对其基本参数、类型参
数、连线参数和移动参数进行调节。
zh-chs.ui_about_describeText:
相关说明：
由于项目工作量较大，难免会有部分BUG没有排查到。如果你发现了BUG，请移步到创意工坊描述BUG发生原因以及产生的结果。感谢大家长期以来的支持。

zh-cht.ui_BG_Text:
背景設置

設置背景相關的參數。目前支持純色/線性、圖片、
幻燈片和視頻背景。
zh-cht.ui_video_Text: 支持WebM格式視頻，妳可以通過ffmpeg將其他格式轉換成WebM。視頻列表和轉換具體方法詳見創意工坊。
zh-cht.ui_global_Text:
全局設置

影響音頻圓環和日期顯示，對其基礎參數、坐標參
數進行統壹設置。
zh-cht.ui_circle_AudioText:
音頻設置

設置音頻相關的參數，影響音頻圓環和音頻條形。
zh-cht.ui_circle_Text:
圓環設置

設置音頻圓環相關的參數，對其基本參數、坐標參
數、圓環參數、線條參數和小球參數進行調節。
zh-cht.ui_bars_Text:
條形設置

設置音頻條形相關的參數，對其基本參數、坐標參
數和線條參數進行調節。
zh-cht.ui_logo_Text:
標誌設置

設置標誌相關的參數，對其基本參數、坐標參
數和標誌參數進行調節。
zh-cht.ui_date_Text:
日期設置

設置日期相關的參數，對其基本參數、坐標參數、
日期參數和天氣參數進行調節。天氣顯示僅支持中
國地區。
zh-cht.ui_particles_Text:
粒子設置

設置粒子特效相關的參數，對其基本參數、類型參
數、連線參數、移動參數進行調節。
zh-cht.ui_about_describeText:
相關說明：
由於項目工作量較大，難免會有部分BUG沒有排查到。如果妳發現了BUG，請移步到創意工坊描述BUG發生原因以及產生的結果。感謝大家長期以來的支持。
